channel.title: Quran Podcast
channel.description: A podcast that recites the Quran and explains its meanings.

item.title: Surah Al-Fatiha Recitation
item.description: Recitation and explanation of Surah Al-Fatiha (Arabic: الفاتحة, English: The Opening), by Alafasy.
item.itunes:summary: Recitation and explanation of Surah Al-Fatiha (الفاتحة), the first chapter of the Quran, essential for daily prayers, recited by Alafasy.
item.itunes:author: Alquran
item.itunes:subtitle: Al-Fatiha (الفاتحة) - Recited by Alafasy

item.title: Surah Al-Baqarah Recitation
item.description: Recitation and explanation of Surah Al-Baqarah (Arabic: البقرة, English: The Cow), by Alafasy.
item.itunes:summary: Recitation and explanation of Surah Al-Baqarah (البقرة), the longest Surah in the Quran, recited by Alafasy.
item.itunes:author: Alquran
item.itunes:subtitle: Al-Baqarah (البقرة) - Recited by Alafasy

item.title: Surah Al-Ikhlas Recitation
item.description: Recitation and explanation of Surah Al-Ikhlas (Arabic: الإخلاص, English: The Purity), by Alafasy.
item.itunes:summary: Recitation and explanation of Surah Al-Ikhlas (الإخلاص), focusing on the oneness of Allah, recited by Alafasy.
item.itunes:author: Alquran
item.itunes:subtitle: Al-Ikhlas (الإخلاص) - Recited by Alafasy

item.title: Surah Al-Nas Recitation
item.description: Recitation and explanation of Surah Al-Nas (Arabic: الناس, English: The People), by Alafasy.
item.itunes:summary: Recitation and explanation of Surah Al-Nas (الناس), a chapter for seeking refuge from harm, recited by Alafasy.
item.itunes:author: Alquran
item.itunes:subtitle: Al-Nas (الناس) - Recited by Alafasy

item.title: Surah Al-Falaq Recitation
item.description: Recitation and explanation of Surah Al-Falaq (Arabic: الفلق, English: The Daybreak), by Alafasy.
item.itunes:summary: Recitation and explanation of Surah Al-Falaq (الفلق), seeking refuge from the evil of darkness and harm, recited by Alafasy.
item.itunes:author: Alquran
item.itunes:subtitle: Al-Falaq (الفلق) - Recited by Alafasy

item.title: Surah Al-Alaq Recitation
item.description: Recitation and explanation of Surah Al-Alaq (Arabic: العلق, English: The Clot), by Alafasy.
item.itunes:summary: Recitation and explanation of Surah Al-Alaq (العلق), focusing on the creation of man, recited by Alafasy.
item.itunes:author: Alquran
item.itunes:subtitle: Al-Alaq (العلق) - Recited by Alafasy

item.title: Surah Al-Mulk Recitation
item.description: Recitation and explanation of Surah Al-Mulk (Arabic: الملك, English: The Sovereignty), by Alafasy.
item.itunes:summary: Recitation and explanation of Surah Al-Mulk (الملك), emphasizing Allah's dominion over the universe, recited by Alafasy.
item.itunes:author: Alquran
item.itunes:subtitle: Al-Mulk (الملك) - Recited by Alafasy

item.title: Surah Al-Qamar Recitation
item.description: Recitation and explanation of Surah Al-Qamar (Arabic: القمر, English: The Moon), by Alafasy.
item.itunes:summary: Recitation and explanation of Surah Al-Qamar (القمر), discussing the signs of Allah in the moon and the natural world, recited by Alafasy.
item.itunes:author: Alquran
item.itunes:subtitle: Al-Qamar (القمر) - Recited by Alafasy

item.title: Surah Al-Nisa Recitation
item.description: Recitation and explanation of Surah Al-Nisa (Arabic: النساء, English: The Women), by Alafasy.
item.itunes:summary: Recitation and explanation of Surah Al-Nisa (النساء), which discusses the rights and roles of women in Islam, recited by Alafasy.
item.itunes:author: Alquran
item.itunes:subtitle: Al-Nisa (النساء) - Recited by Alafasy

item.title: Surah At-Tawbah Recitation
item.description: Recitation and explanation of Surah At-Tawbah (Arabic: التوبة, English: The Repentance), by Alafasy.
item.itunes:summary: Recitation and explanation of Surah At-Tawbah (التوبة), focusing on repentance and forgiveness, recited by Alafasy.
item.itunes:author: Alquran
item.itunes:subtitle: At-Tawbah (التوبة) - Recited by Alafasy
